title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.327 - Treasury stock
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.327 - Treasury stock

State Regulations

Full-paid capital reacquired by the issuing company
through gift, purchase or otherwise and available for resale or cancellation. Treasury stock is not a part of capital stock outstanding; and the term does
not apply to unissued capital stock or to shares forfeited for nonpayment of
subscriptions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.327

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
